casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Walter LEMLEY, Jr. No. 62P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Walter Lemley, Badin, for Lemley, Walter (Jr.). Kristin Jo Uicker, for State of North Carolina.

N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of February 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
